title: Spreadsheets Course
desc: Learn how to manage spreadsheets effectively using powerful tools. Software used: Microsoft Excel (Subscription-based), Google Sheets (Free), LibreOffice Calc (Free, Open-source).

title: Charts and Graphs Course
desc: Learn to create and analyze visual data representations. Software used: Tableau (Trial version available), Google Charts (Free), Microsoft Power BI (Free and Pro versions).

title: Website Hosting Course
desc: Set up and manage web hosting efficiently using leading platforms. Software used: GitHub Pages (Free), Netlify (Free with premium options), Vercel (Free with premium options).

title: Cloud Computing Course
desc: Understand cloud computing and how to leverage it for scalability. Software used: AWS Free Tier, Google Cloud (Free trial with $300 credit), Microsoft Azure (Free trial with $200 credit).

title: Smartphone Apps Development Course
desc: Develop mobile applications with industry-leading frameworks. Software used: Flutter (Free, Open-source), React Native (Free, Open-source), Android Studio (Free), Xcode (Free, macOS only).

title: Leadership and Management Course
desc: Enhance leadership and management skills for business success. Software used: Trello (Free with premium options), Asana (Free with premium options), Microsoft Teams (Free with premium options).

title: Entrepreneurship Course
desc: Master the fundamentals of starting and managing your own business. Software used: Google Workspace (Free and paid plans), QuickBooks (Subscription-based), Canva (Free with premium options).
